snippet.title: Mother 1+2 Fan Translation: The First 15 Minutes
snippet.description:
This is the current state of the Mother 1+2 Fan Translation.
This translates the Mother 2 Side with VWFs (Variable-Width-Font) to make it as close to EarthBound as possible.
This also shows the current state of the sound restoration.

NOTE: The Onett theme playing instead of Pokey's theme is NOT INTENDED. That is merely a bug with audio insertion. It will be fixed when it's complete.

Join the Discord! https://discord.gg/qrctgHJ
We post updates and you can contribute if you want!
The server is mildly active.
